name: Spicy Thai Shrimp Salad
author: Kikkoman
summary: Jumbo shrimp are brined, roasted, then tossed  with colorful bell peppers and cilantro in a zesty lemony soy-sesame dressing.
ingredients: 2 pounds jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 cup sliced peppers (red, yellow or orange)
directions: To brine shrimp, combine water, salt, sugar, and Kikkoman Soy Sauce in a large bowl, stirring to dissolve salt and sugar
Submerge 2 pounds of peeled and deveined shrimp in the brine
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Place on a rimmed baking sheet in a single layer
Roast shrimp until done, 6 to 8 minutes
Whisk lemon juice, soy sauce, sesame oil, cayenne pepper, and garlic in a large bowl
Add peppers, cilantro, and shrimp; toss to coat
